properties.name_of_library_or_collection: Society of Antiquaries of London Library

descriptions.value: Collects on all regions of Britain. Focus on antiquities, topography, architecture.
Collects on all historic counties of England.
Mainly collect published primary sources. Covers Britain and Ireland.
Many collections relating to Manchester and region, particularly on business and religion.

properties.name_of_library_or_collection: Ahmed Iqbal Ullah Race Relations Resource Centre

descriptions.value: Focus on BAME history in Manchester. Includes 300 oral history interviews.
Focus on London, radicalism and the counter-culture. Oral history and street photography.
60,000 print items covering the historic environment. Photographic archive: over a million photos of England's archaeology, historic buildings and social history.

properties.name_of_library_or_collection: University of Nottingham Manuscripts and Special Collections - the East Midlands Collection
University of Leeds Library, Special Collections

descriptions.value: Includes Yorkshire Archaeological & Historical Society collections.
5,000 books, plus pamphlets, newspapers, periodicals and directories, devoted mainly to Staffordshire, but also covering Cheshire, Derbyshire and Shropshire.

properties.name_of_library_or_collection: London Metropolitan University Library Special Collections

descriptions.value: Trade Union and communtiy history with focus on London. TUC Library is housed here, London Trades Council minutes 1860 - 1970; London Bookbinders and Paperworkers.  London Met Collections include: Archive of the Irish in Britain; Community Media Collection (community radio and TV in UK); East End Archive (artists); E & A Wates Archive (East London business.)

The Bridgewater Collection: over 200 rare bibliographic items related to Cumberland and Westmorland, c. 1700-current.  The College has a historic collection with the area.  A large and important collection of heraldic visitation MSS related to various parts of England, collected and copied in the C16th and 17th.

Greater Manchester-related books, journals, pamphlets, ephemera, parish register transcripts and more, plus a 'Manchester Bibliography' card index of mainly articles, related to Manchester history from c.1975-1995. Also home to the North West Film Archive.

properties.name_of_library_or_collection: HADAS - Hendon and District Archaeological Society

descriptions.value: A small number of local (Barnet) books and excavation reports.

properties.name_of_library_or_collection: Museum of the Order of St John

descriptions.value: The Museum of the Order of St John holds museum, library and archive collections relating to the Order of St John and St John's Ambulance. Material on Clerkenwell Priory is relevant to the history of London.

Senate House Library has strong print and electronic collections of resources about British history, covering all regions of the UK.  Our research collections include academic monographs and journals but also more unusual materials such as pamphlets or the output of small press publishers. We also hold a series of local history journals covering most regions of the UK.
